DIF.Entry_Title: Rock glacier velocities, Selwyn Mountains, Yukon and NWT, Canada

Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Title: Rock glacier velocities, Selwyn Mountains, Yukon and NWT, Canada
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Publisher: NSIDC: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Location.Detailed_Location: Frances Lake map area, Selwyn Mountains, Yukon and Northwest Territories, Canda

Contact_Address.Address: National Snow and Ice Data Center

DIF.Reference: Dyke, A. S. 1990a. A lichenometric study of Holocene rock glaciers and Neoglacial moraines, Frances Lake map area, Southeastern Yukon Territory and Northwest Territories. Geological Survey of Canada, Bulletin, 394. 33 p. Dyke, A. S. 1990b. Quaternary geology of the Frances Lake map area, Yukon and Northwest Territories. Memoir - Geological Survey of Canada, 426. 39 p. Dyke, A. S. 1990c. Surficial materials and landforms, Dolly Varden Creek, Yukon Territory. Geological Survey of Canada, Map 1677A, scale 1:100,000. Dyke, A. S. 1990d. Surficial Materials and landforms, Frances River, Yukon Territory, Geological Survey of Canada. Geological Survey of Canada, Map 1676A, scale 1:100,000. Dyke, A. S. 1990e. Surficial materials and landforms, Yuzeyu River, Yukon Territory, Geological Survey of Canada. Geological Survey of Canada, Map 1674A, scale 1:100,000. Dyke, A. S. 1990f. Surficial materials and landforms, Little Hyland River, Yukon Territory and District of Mackenzie, Geological Survey of Canada, Map 1675A, scale 1:100,000. Sloan, V. F., and Dyke, L.D. 1998. Rock glacier velocities in the Selwyn Mountains, Yukon and Northwest Territories, Canada. In: Proceedings of the VII International Conference on Permafrost. Yellowknife, NWT., Canada. Sloan, V.F., and L.D. Dyke. 1998. Rock glacier velocities in the Selwyn Mountains, Yukon and Northwest Territories, Canada: An extended abstract and data. In: International Permafrost Association, Data and Information Working Group, comp. Circumpolar Active-layer Permafrost System (CAPS), version 1.0. CD-ROM available from National Snow and Ice Data Center, nsidc@kryos.colorado.edu. Boulder, Colorado: NSIDC, University of Colorado at Boulder. Sloan, V.F., and L.D. Dyke. (submitted). Decadal- and millennial velocities of rock glaciers in the Selwyn Mountains, Canada. Geog. Ann.

Summary.Abstract: An average of 6 markers were surveyed on each of 15 rock glaciers, once each in 1983 and 1995 using a level (1983) and a theodolite (1995). Measurement error was on the order of 3 percent, however, the greatest variability in observed velocities is explained by the varying locations of the markers on the rock glaciers. Lichen ages were determined by Dyke (1990a), and rock glacier lengths were obtained from 1:50,000 surficial geology maps used to compile the maps in Dyke (1990c-f). Please see the data documentation for further information.
